channel.title: Sub ita win 8?
channel.description:
Salve, ho installato oggi il gioco, sono italiano e uso win 8 64 bit, non mi spuntano i sottotitoli in italiano, come devo fare?
English translate google: Hi, I installed the game today, I'm Italian and use win 8 64 bit, I do not sprout subtitles in Italian, as I do?

item.title: Sub ita win 8?

item.description:
You’ll be wanting the Translation thread. Thanks.

Read full topic
